Package ca.phon.ipamap

Class IpaMap

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
ca.phon.ipamap.IpaMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class IpaMap
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner
Displays a sectioned list of ipa grids. Each grid is inside a collapsible panel. The entire thing is already inside a scroll pane. The UI is scaled by font size. Minimum font is 12pt and maximum is 24pt. Scale is set as a floating point value between 0 and 1.
See Also:
Serialized Form
